name: @icure/md-api
description: Typescript version of the medical device SDK

scripts.genloc: java -classpath swagger-codegen-generators.jar io.swagger.codegen.v3.cli.SwaggerCodegen generate -i http://127.0.0.1:8912/v3/api-docs/v2 -l typescript --additional-properties classPrefix=Md skipPathPrefix=/rest/v2 -o ./
scripts.prepare: rimraf dist && npm run build && jq '{name:.name, version:.version, description:.description, main:.main, types:.types, dependencies:.dependencies, author:.author, license:.license, bugs:.bugs, homepage:.homepage}' < package.json > dist/package.json
scripts.publish: yarn version && yarn run prepare && cd dist && yarn publish --no-git-tag-version --new-version `git describe --abbrev=0 --tags` && cd ..

author: Taktik sa
